definition: (of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)

sentences.english: Lesions which have crusted fully are considered healed and not active.
sentences.chinese: 已結痂的病損可以認爲是治癒或無活動的。

sentences.english: Scabs are finally growing over Wall Street's gaping wounds.
sentences.chinese: 華爾街那些大大小小的傷口終於開始結痂癒合了。

sentences.english: Does the scabby meeting after fracture disappear?
sentences.chinese: 骨折後的結痂會消失麼？

sentences.english: Tiny scabs may also form at the injection sites.
sentences.chinese: 小結痂也可能出現在注射部位。

sentences.english: Its should wait to fall off by oneself patiently after cut is scabby .
sentences.chinese: 傷口結痂後要耐心等待其自行脫落。

sentences.english: The bullae developed into ulcers which finally became scars.
sentences.chinese: 血泡漸形成瘍，最後自愈結痂爲疤。

sentences.english: Once they have the shot, the crusts will start falling out in a couple of days.
sentences.chinese: 當第一針注射的幾天後結痂就會開始掉落。

sentences.english: After the operation, is cut heal scabby good?
sentences.chinese: 手術後，傷口癒合結痂好麼？

sentences.english: Blisters form, rupture, then crust over before healing
sentences.chinese: 然後出現水皰，水皰會破裂，結痂。

sentences.english: Pruritis, papules, pustules, crusts and scabs.
sentences.chinese: 搔癢，丘疹，膿皰，外皮堅硬並結痂。

sentences.english: Three weeks might be necessary before the complete elimination of the crusts.
sentences.chinese: 可能需要三週時間結痂才能完全消失。

sentences.english: Observe stoma site for bleeding, crust, irritation, and broken skin .
sentences.chinese: 觀察出口有無出血，結痂，發炎及破皮。

sentences.english: It is as if grief is the scab that permits healing.
sentences.chinese: 悲傷好象是幫助癒合的結痂。

sentences.english: He also has scabs all over his nose and ears.
sentences.chinese: 他鼻子和耳朵上的所有傷疤都已結痂了。

sentences.english: The cut on my leg has been sloughed away.
sentences.chinese: 我腿的傷口已結痂脫落了。

definition: wisps of blood/visible veins/(of eyes) bloodshot
